Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockingContainable  
    Chap
    The player controlled token
    ColoredPickup
    The Door, should only unlock if the Chap has the matching Key
    Containable
    Base class for objects which may be inside FreeTiles
    Crate
    A Crate which may be pushed by Chap
    Door
    The Door, should only unlock if the Chap has the matching Key
    Drawable
    Base class for anything which can be drawn on the board
    Enemy
    The pathfinding enemy tokens
    Exit
    The Exit tile and goal of the level
    ExitLock
    The ExitLock, should only unlock if the Chap has collected all Treasures
    InfoField
    Shows an information popup when Chap walks over it
    Key
    A Key which may be picked up by Chap and unlocks a matching Door
    Maze
    The Maze board, which keeps track of the Tiles and logic in the game
    Movable
    Base class for objects which can move or be moved around the board
    PathFinder  
    PathTile
    A tile which Chap may walk on, and may contain Containables
    Pickup
    Base class for objects the Chap can pick up
    Teleporter
    Teleports chap when walked on
    Tile
    Base class for all Tiles representable on the board
    Treasure
    A Treasure which may be picked up by Chap and unlocks the final ExitLock once all have been obtained
    Trigger
    Base class for objects the Chap can pick up
    UndoRedoHandler  
    WallTile
    A wall tile, which Chap may not walk on
    Water
    The Door, should only unlock if the Chap has the matching Key
  • Enum Summary

    Maze.KeyColor
